entry.title: is-christmas
entry.content:
is-christmas

Is today Christmas?

Is it christmas today? Well, a fun little module to enjoy your vaction time.

This module on CLI returns true if it's christmas.

Get it: npm install [-g] is-christmas

Usage:

```js const isChristmas = require('is-christmas');

isChristmas(); //=> true ```

```sh $ is-christmas --help

Usage

is-christmas

Examples

$ is-christmas
true

```

GIT FTW!

entry.title: unsplash-wallpaper
entry.content:
unsplash-wallpaper

unsplash images as your wallpaper from CLI.

unsplash-wallpaper an inviting module that helps you set images from unsplash as your desktop wallpaper.

Get it: npm install -g unsplash-wallpaper

Usage:

```sh $ unsplash-wallpaper

To learn the commands: $ unsplash-wallpaper --help To save the image resolution: $ unsplash-wallpaper --width 2880 --height 1800 -s To download and use a random image: $ unsplash-wallpaper -r ```

GIF FTW

entry.title: covfefe
entry.content:
covfefe

Despite the constant negative press covfefe.

Time for a fun module this week, it's covfefe. (Hope you are aware of it!)

Get it: npm install covfefe

Sample usage:

```js

const covfefe = require('covfefe');

covfefe('Despite the constant negative press'); "Despite the constant negative press covfefe"

covfefe.translate('I have good coverage of spray tan'); "I have good covfefe of spray tan" ```

GIF FTW!

entry.title: rest-your-eyes
entry.content:
rest-your-eyes

rest-your-eyes is a fun little module that makes use of the brightness module to well so that you an rest your eyes while your command runs Your screen will become bright again after the command completes execution.

Get it: npm install -g rest-your-eyes

Sample usage:

sh rest npm install

GIF FTW

Till next time!

entry.title: rainbowify
entry.content:
rainbowify

rainbow print stuff in terminal

rainbowify is an module extracted from mocha's nyan.js which is a fun little module that helps to print rainbow text on the terminal.

Get it: npm install --global rainbowify

Usage:

sh $ echo <some_text> | rainbowify

GIF FTW!
